author: vmassol
msg: updates to reflect all changes on cookie and httpclient things

author: vmassol
msg: replaced this.logger.xxx() by logger.xxx() as logger is a static variable

author: vmassol
msg: * Cactus no longer manages Cookies; it has been externalized to Commons HttpClient. Cactus still possess a Cookie class so that we can change the internal implementation as we wish, but the current implementation is now done through HttpClient.
* Cookie handling has been much improved (see changes file)
* Reformatting of code to be compliant with coding conventions (this.logger.xxx() transformed in logger.xxx() as logger is a static variable)

author: vmassol
msg: removed dependency on commons-httpclient for the time being until after release 1.2
